translation.en: [Kirigan] On our maps, the Shadow Fold is a black stain.
translation.zh: 在我们的地图上 暗影黑幕是一片黑色的污渍

translation.en: A scar that severs Ravka in two.
translation.zh: 是一道将拉夫卡一分为二的伤疤

translation.en: It was created hundreds of years ago as an act of vengeance
translation.zh: 它的诞生可追溯到 数百年前的一次复仇行动

translation.en: by the Black Heretic.
translation.zh: 其创造者黑色异端

translation.en: A man who could summon shadow.
translation.zh: 是一个可以召唤暗影的男人

translation.en: He was among those rare souls, the Grisha,
translation.zh: 他是少数族群格里莎的一员

translation.en: who could manipulate the elements of this world.
translation.zh: 他们可以操控这个世界上的各种要素

translation.en: The Fold locked East Ravka away from the sea ports on the west.
translation.zh: 黑幕将东拉夫卡 和西部的海港隔绝开来

translation.en: The east withered and became vulnerable to attack
translation.zh: 东部因此衰落 并频频遭到

translation.en: from enemy nations in the north and south.
translation.zh: 来自北方和南方的敌国侵袭

translation.en: With their powers, only the Grisha were capable of crossing the Fold.
translation.zh: 格里莎凭借他们的力量 成了唯一能够穿越黑幕的群体

translation.en: They joined forces with the King in service to Ravka.
translation.zh: 他们与国王联合起来 共同为拉夫卡服务

translation.en: They became the lifeline between the two sides of our country.
translation.zh: 他们成了连接我国东西部的生命线

translation.en: But they were still hated
translation.zh: 但因为黑色异端的罪行

translation.en: for the sins of the Black Heretic.
translation.zh: 他们依旧遭人记恨

translation.en: Sins felt most deeply by his descendants.
translation.zh: 他的后代对他的罪孽感受最深

translation.en: Old myths foretell of a Grisha never before seen.
translation.zh: 古老的神话预言了 一位前所未有的格里沙的诞生

translation.en: One who could destroy the Fold, reunite Ravka
translation.zh: 他可以摧毁黑幕 重新统一拉夫卡

translation.en: and redeem our people.
translation.zh: 从而为我们的同胞带来救赎

translation.en: A Summoner of pure light.
translation.zh: 一个能够召唤纯洁之光的召唤者

translation.en: And so we wait for the one who will deliver us
translation.zh: 为此 我们一直盼着他的到来 期望他能够将我们

translation.en: from the dark place we made in the world.
translation.zh: 从我们制造的黑暗世界中拯救出来

translation.en: We wait
translation.zh: 我们一直期盼着

translation.en: for the Sun Summoner.
translation.zh: 太阳召唤者的到来

translation.en: [Alina] When I was young, I was afraid of the dark.
translation.zh: 小时候 我惧怕黑暗

translation.en: When I got older, I learned that darkness is a place,
translation.zh: 等到长大一些 我懂得了黑暗之处

translation.en: -and it's full of monsters. -[growling]
translation.zh: 是怪物栖息之所

translation.en: I live in East Ravka, but I've never been welcome here
translation.zh: 我住在东拉夫卡 但一直为当地人所不容

translation.en: because I look like my mother, and she looked like the enemy.
translation.zh: 因为我承袭了妈妈的样貌 而她长得像大家的敌人

translation.en: Alina, how can you do that in here?
translation.zh: 阿丽娜 你在马车上绘图？

translation.en: Bumps help with texture.
translation.zh: 颠簸可以赋予线条质感

translation.en: The Fold looks different on mine.
translation.zh: 我画的黑幕跟你的不太一样

translation.en: I need to get a better view from your country.
translation.zh: 我得从你的国家那边好好观察一下

translation.en: [man 1] She grew up here. Come on!
translation.zh: 她是在这儿长大的 去你的！

translation.en: [man 2] The Shu Han didn't want her either.
translation.zh: 书翰那边的人也不待见她

translation.en: Cartographers, listen up. We're almost there.
translation.zh: 制图师们 注意 我们快到了

translation.en: Pack up and be ready to leave.
translation.zh: 收拾好东西准备下车

translation.en: And if you lose anything, you will not be getting a replacement.
translation.zh: 如有物品丢失 可是没有备用品替换的

translation.en: [Alina] But they aren't the monsters. They're just boys.
translation.zh: 但他们不是怪物 只是群大男孩

translation.en: I learned about my true enemy when I was a child.
translation.zh: 我打小就知道了什么才是真正的敌人

translation.en: [young Alina] Is it real?
translation.zh: 它真的存在吗？

translation.en: Of course it's real.
translation.zh: 当然是真的

translation.en: The Fold ate your parents.
translation.zh: 黑幕吞噬了你的父母

translation.en: It's the reason for many of the orphans here.
translation.zh: （改编自李巴杜格系列小说） 这里很多孤儿都因它失去了双亲

translation.en: People trying to cross. Taunting the Saints.
translation.zh: 人们试图穿过黑幕 还嘲笑圣者

translation.en: Then why cross it? Why not go around?
translation.zh: 那为什么还要这么做？ 为何不绕道而行？

translation.en: Read the map.
translation.zh: 你看看地图

translation.en: The north want our Grisha dead,
translation.zh: 北方人与我们的格里莎水火不容

translation.en: the south guards its mountains.
translation.zh: 南方人坚守自封他们的山脉

translation.en: We have nowhere else to go.
translation.zh: 我们没有其他路可走

translation.en: Now work on your shading, girl.
translation.zh: 好好练习描绘阴影吧 孩子

translation.en: Keep a pencil in your hand.
translation.zh: 手里要时刻拿着铅笔

translation.en: Or else someone will put a rifle in it instead.
translation.zh: 否则有人会塞把来福枪给你

translation.en: [Alina] I spent years thinking I'd find a way out.
translation.zh: 多年来 我以为自己能找到出路

translation.en: Around the Fold, to go somewhere where no one cares where I'm from.
translation.zh: 绕过黑幕 到没有人在乎我出身的地方去

translation.en: But now, I'm old enough to know the only way out is through.
translation.zh: 而现在 我已经长大了 知道唯一的出路就是穿过黑幕

translation.en: We are never going to see it go away. This abomination is here forever.
translation.zh: 它永远不会消失 这令人憎恶的黑暗会永远横亘于此

translation.en: You don't go to church.
translation.zh: 没有信仰的家伙

translation.en: A Saint who can summon the sun will destroy it.
translation.zh: 会有一个能召唤太阳的圣者 把它摧毁的

translation.en: I'd like to see even one person who isn't scared of that.
translation.zh: 若有人不惧黑幕 我倒想见识见识

translation.en: [woman] I bet I know someone.
translation.zh: 我想我知道一个人

translation.en: Mal. He isn't afraid of anything.
translation.zh: 玛尔 他无所畏惧

translation.en: [sighs] You'd be surprised.
translation.zh: 你会大吃一惊的

translation.en: [softly] Alina.
translation.zh: 阿丽娜

translation.en: Mal?
translation.zh: 玛尔？

translation.en: Look what I found.
translation.zh: 看我找到了什么

translation.en: -Where? -[young Mal] Little guy's lost.
translation.zh: 在哪找到的呀？ 小家伙迷路了

translation.en: But I found some chewed plants in the woods to the east.
translation.zh: 但我在东边的树林里 发现了被啃食过的植物

translation.en: I bet his warren's there.
translation.zh: 它的窝应该就在那边

translation.en: Why you run from me, half-breed?
translation.zh: 你跑什么呀 杂种？

translation.en: Stay away from him.
translation.zh: 离他远点儿

translation.en: Or what? You going to draw me, rice eater?
translation.zh: 不然呢？你要给我画像吗 饭桶？

translation.en: Or I'll cut you.
translation.zh: 不然我用刀切你

translation.en: -[footsteps approaching] -What's this?
translation.zh: 你们在做什么？

translation.en: Who's tracked in dirt on my rug? Mal Oretsev!
translation.zh: 谁弄脏了我的地毯？玛尔奥勒瑟夫！

translation.en: Mal?
translation.zh: 玛尔？

translation.en: I know you're hiding here!
translation.zh: 我知道你躲在这里！

translation.en: -Come out now! -No!
translation.zh: -快出来！ -不要！

translation.en: Can't hide forever.
translation.zh: 你不可能躲一辈子

translation.en: Yes, I can!
translation.zh: 我可以！

translation.en: All right, maybe you can.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许你可以

translation.en: But this is what you become!
translation.zh: 但这样一来

translation.en: A boy who hides from a fight!
translation.zh: 你就成了临阵脱逃的懦夫！

translation.en: Get very good at it, maybe you'll survive to see 20.
translation.zh: 好好当个缩头乌龟吧 没准你能活到20岁

translation.en: Bring me a big rabbit before the dinner bell goes.
translation.zh: 晚餐铃响之前 给我带只大兔子回来

translation.en: Final bets! Final bets!
translation.zh: 最后一轮下注！

translation.en: Keep it clean, boys, go on.
translation.zh: 光明正大地比斗吧 小伙子们 开始

translation.en: [man 1] Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [man 2] Get stuck in there. Let's go! Come on!
translation.zh: 全力出击 上啊！加油！

translation.en: It's all right, breathe. Breathe, here we go. Come on.
translation.zh: 没关系！稳住呼吸 吸气 好了 去吧 加油

translation.en: He'll be all right?
translation.zh: 他没事吧？

translation.en: I'm sure we'll find out. Come on, hit him! Belt him.
translation.zh: 待会儿就知道了 上啊 动手！打他

translation.en: He doesn't want it! Come on, chump! He doesn't want it!
translation.zh: 人家不吃这一套！ 别傻了 笨蛋！人家不吃这一套！

translation.en: [man 3] Hurt him, now! Hurt him!
translation.zh: 快让他吃点苦头

translation.en: [man 3] Come on, let's go! Let's go now! Let's have it. Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧 上啊 快出手 击败他 上啊！

translation.en: Lovely!
translation.zh: 好样的！

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 好啊！

translation.en: You beauty!
translation.zh: 好小子！

translation.en: My boy, Mal Oretsev, wins again! Who wants a go?
translation.zh: 我哥们儿玛尔奥勒瑟夫又赢了！ 还有谁想挑战他？

translation.en: [man 4] I'll take a turn.
translation.zh: 我来试试

translation.en: How about it? Just you and me.
translation.zh: 怎么样？你我二人对决

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: If you lose, you'll be in the medika. If you win, they'll throw you in the brig.
translation.zh: 你要是输了 铁定得进医院 就算赢了 也会被他们关进监狱

translation.en: Shut it down, boys! Shut it down!
translation.zh: 对局结束 诸位！结束！

translation.en: You try me without that magic, huh?
translation.zh: 你有种试试不用魔法看看

translation.en: It's just air.
translation.zh: 只是空气而已嘛

translation.en: Come on! Anyone!
translation.zh: 不是吧！谁来都行啊！

translation.en: Alina!
translation.zh: 阿丽娜！

translation.en: When did you get in?
translation.zh: 你几时来的？

translation.en: Yesterday. Everyone's getting their assignments.
translation.zh: 昨天 大家都在接任务呢

translation.en: Suppose cartography's heading back south. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 我猜制图队要掉头往南走

translation.en: I found out 'cause they're putting my unit with yours again.
translation.zh: 我也发现了 因为我这队人又要与你们同行了

translation.en: They're looking for a way through the mountains.
translation.zh: 他们想设法穿越山脉

translation.en: Oh! So we're back together?
translation.zh: 那我们又能在一起了？

translation.en: They can't keep best friends apart for too long.
translation.zh: 他们总不能让两个好朋友分开太久嘛

translation.en: Corporal Oretsev, are you saying you miss me?
translation.zh: 奥勒瑟夫下士 你这是想我了吗？

translation.en: Well, I need someone to take the fall for my petty crimes, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只不过想着违纪时得有个替罪羊

translation.en: -Oh, they moved our tent. -Yeah, it's down that end now.
translation.zh: -我们的营地转移了 -是啊 换到那头去了

translation.en: [Alina] So many First Army here.
translation.zh: 这里好多第一军团的人

translation.en: We look like a halfway house, accepting donations.
translation.zh: 看起来真像个过渡教习所 接受各种捐助

translation.en: Actually, I won't be accepting any donations
translation.zh: 其实 我不必接受捐助了

translation.en: -because I won this betting on a fight. -Huh?
translation.zh: 因为我在比武赌斗中赢了钱

translation.en: Look at you. Flush with five whole… kruge?
translation.zh: 发财了呀你 搞到了五张…克鲁格？

translation.en: What will you do with foreign money? We're not in Ketterdam.
translation.zh: 你拿着外币能干什么？ 我们又不在凯特丹

translation.en: Don't crush my dreams.
translation.zh: 别戳破我的美梦

translation.en: [woman] Again! Inferni!
translation.zh: 再来！御火师！

translation.en: Nice. Nice. Good. Good. Again.
translation.zh: 不错 很好 再来

translation.en: [Mal] This is why our tents got moved.
translation.zh: 难怪我们的营地被迁走了

translation.en: -[woman] Good. -Grisha wanted more space.
translation.zh: -很好 -格里莎战士想要更多场地

translation.en: Ugh. Grisha.
translation.zh: 格里莎

translation.en: Now. I'm going to do it again.
translation.zh: 现在 我再来一次

translation.en: Show-offs.
translation.zh: 真爱显摆

translation.en: [woman] Another Inferni and Squaller.
translation.zh: 又一个御火师和御风师合作的例子

translation.en: They're always picking on us when their general's not around.
translation.zh: 这些人总趁他们将军不在时欺负我们

translation.en: It's like home all over again.
translation.zh: 简直跟在老家时一模一样

translation.en: It wasn't all bad. We learned some good life lessons back then.
translation.zh: 也不完全是坏事 那阵子我们学会了很多生活教训

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah? Care to share with the class?
translation.zh: 是吗？说来听听

translation.en: One, don't cry in public.
translation.zh: 第一条 不当众流泪

translation.en: Hide your emotional breakdown for when you're alone. Obviously.
translation.zh: 隐藏住情绪 显然 你得等到独处时再崩溃

translation.en: -Two, always carry a weapon on you. -Always.
translation.zh: -第二条 武器不离身 -绝不

translation.en: There's a third I can't remember.
translation.zh: 还有第三条的 我给忘了

translation.en: [soldier 1] Open her up, we're loading!
translation.zh: 打开舱门 开始装船！

translation.en: [Alina] That looks new.
translation.zh: 那瞧着像新造的

translation.en: Brand-new. Grisha call it ultralight.
translation.zh: 全新的 格里莎说这是超轻型飞船

translation.en: Made by their own Fabrikators. It's supposed to be faster.
translation.zh: 由格里莎造物师打造 据说速度更快

translation.en: What happened to the last one?
translation.zh: 之前那艘怎么了？

translation.en: Never came back.
translation.zh: 一去不回

translation.en: -[man] There he is! -Here we go.
translation.zh: -他在那儿！ -来了

translation.en: I would have made a killing on you,
translation.zh: 我本来可以靠你大赚一笔

translation.en: but nah, he refused to loan me any money, so…
translation.zh: 可他不愿借钱给我 所以…

translation.en: That's because you're a child in a bigger child's body.
translation.zh: 因为你就是个长不大的老小子

translation.en: -You're shorter than I am. -Okay. Dubrov, Mikhael, this is Alina.
translation.zh: -你小子还没有我高 -杜布洛夫、米凯尔 这是阿丽娜

translation.en: Your little friend from Keramzin? -[Dubrov] Ah… -This is her.
translation.zh: 你那位从科尔姆森来的小伙伴？ 就是她呀

translation.en: -"Little friend"? -How is that wrong?
translation.zh: -“小伙伴”？ -有问题吗？

translation.en: -He talks about you all the time. -What does he say?
translation.zh: -他总聊起你 -他说我什么了？

translation.en: -[Mikhael] Oh, well… -Don't listen to these two.
translation.zh: -这个嘛… -别听他俩瞎说

translation.en: They like to exaggerate. It's what they do.
translation.zh: 他们就爱夸大其词

translation.en: -[chuckles] Look at him! -Oh, he's so easy to rile.
translation.zh: -你看他！ -太容易上火了吧

translation.en: Is that annoying you?
translation.zh: 你很不爽吗？

translation.en: Yeah? All right. Come on, you bastard.
translation.zh: 是哦？好吧 来啊 臭小子

translation.en: -Come on, then. -[horn blaring]
translation.zh: 来啊

translation.en: -Saved by the horn, Mal. -[Mal] Oh, I wouldn't say so.
translation.zh: -号角救了你一命 玛尔 -我可不这么认为

translation.en: What does he say about me?
translation.zh: 他说我什么了？

translation.en: All right, listen up.
translation.zh: 好的 大家听好了

translation.en: I know some of you have been on the road for a week, so I'll be brief.
translation.zh: 我知道你们有些人已经赶了一周的路 我就长话短说了

translation.en: Most of you will continue north to the Fjerdan frontlines.
translation.zh: 你们大部分人 将继续北进前往菲尔达前线

translation.en: Or south to the Shu Han border.
translation.zh: 或者南下前往书翰边界

translation.en: The Second Army, however, has a shiny new solution to our food shortage,
translation.zh: 而第二军团呢 将身负光荣使命 开拓解决我们食品短缺问题的新思路

translation.en: and it sails tomorrow for Novokribirsk.
translation.zh: 明日启航前往诺沃克里比斯克

translation.en: If this model works,
translation.zh: 若此行成功

translation.en: it means a full meal for everyone in this tent next week.
translation.zh: 那将意味着这个帐篷里的所有人 下周都能饱餐一顿

translation.en: It means bullets for your guns and sugar for your tea.
translation.zh: 你们的枪支有弹药可充填 喝茶时有糖可加

translation.en: [soldier] How about some whiskey?
translation.zh: 不如来点威士忌吧

translation.en: Yes, that would be nice, but don't hold your breath.
translation.zh: 不错 有酒更好 但别抱太大期望

translation.en: Of course, they need our help bringing those supplies back,
translation.zh: 当然 他们需要我们协助运回物资

translation.en: so some of you will be assigned.
translation.zh: 所以你们有些人会一同前去

translation.en: "There's nothing to fear."
translation.zh: “没什么好害怕的

translation.en: "I will now be selecting names for what I call the 'nightmare lottery.'"
translation.zh: 我现在将通过‘噩梦抽签’ 决定派遣人员名单”

translation.en: For the supply run across the Fold!
translation.zh: 以下人员将加入物资补给队 穿越黑幕！

translation.en: Sergeant Yure Teplov.
translation.zh: 尤里泰普洛夫中士

translation.en: Tracker Malyen Oretsev!
translation.zh: 追踪手玛尔奥勒瑟夫！

translation.en: Corporal Masyelentov!
translation.zh: 马希尔兰托下士！

translation.en: Did he… But you're in our unit. -Rifleman Valek Tapenyov! -Uh…
translation.zh: -他刚才…可你是我们这队的啊 -步枪兵瓦莱克塔潘尼奥！

translation.en: It has to be an error. It has to be.
translation.zh: 肯定是搞错了 一定是的

translation.en: -Didn't sound like an error, Mal. -And finally, Medic Nolech Barenovsky.
translation.zh: -听着可不像搞错了 玛尔 -最后是医护兵诺里奇拜勒诺夫斯基

translation.en: That's it. Dinner in one hour.
translation.zh: 讲话完毕 一小时后开晚饭

translation.en: Come back and line up by rank. Dismissed.
translation.zh: 到时回来按照军阶排队 解散

translation.en: Mal.
translation.zh: 玛尔

translation.en: Well, if it does work, I'll get to visit Ketterdam.
translation.zh: 如果真能穿越黑幕 我就能去凯特丹逛逛了呢

translation.en: [woman] Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [gambler] Yes! I love it!
translation.zh: 好啊！太棒了！

translation.en: Darling, please. Drinks here. Drinks all round here, please.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 请给我们上酒水 这边每人来一份

translation.en: Hey, you take Zemeni coin, yes?
translation.zh: 你们这儿接受赞姆尼币吧？

translation.en: [man] Let me see that.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: The Lucky Nine casino up the block
translation.zh: 这条街上的“幸运九”赌场

translation.en: has had trouble with counterfeit coin lately.
translation.zh: 最近收到不少假币

translation.en: Heavy, but brittle.
translation.zh: 够分量 但劣质易碎

translation.en: Oh, come on, now. I've been here for hours.
translation.zh: 得了吧 我都在这儿好几个小时了

translation.en: My money is good, no?
translation.zh: 我的钱没问题 对吧？

translation.en: Zemeni coin can take a bullet. But the knockoff…
translation.zh: 赞姆尼币能挡住子弹 而假币嘛…

translation.en: Busted.
translation.zh: 穿帮喽

translation.en: What does that prove?
translation.zh: 那能说明什么？

translation.en: Hey! Wait! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿！等一下！你们干什么？

translation.en: Get off me!
translation.zh: 放开我！

translation.en: No loud noises at the table, Jesper.
translation.zh: 别在桌上大声喧哗 杰斯帕

translation.en: You'll scare off the pigeons.
translation.zh: 会吓跑其他笨蛋的

translation.en: Wouldn't want that, boss.
translation.zh: 我无心的 老大

translation.en: -Shouldn't you be on the door? -Yeah, right away, boss.
translation.zh: -你不是应该守在门口吗？ -对 我这就去 老大

translation.en: Early for action, innit, Kaz?
translation.zh: 先下手为强啊 是吧 卡兹？

translation.en: What do you want, Rotty?
translation.zh: 你想怎么样 若提？

translation.en: Someone stole a DeKappel from a merch's private residence last night.
translation.zh: 有人昨晚从一个商人的私宅 盗走了一件迪卡普尔的作品

translation.en: Is that so?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: It's a painting.
translation.zh: 是一幅画

translation.en: A landscape of Ravka. The Fold. Oil on parchment.
translation.zh: 拉夫卡的风景画《黑幕》 是一幅画在羊皮纸上的油画

translation.en: I know who DeKappel is.
translation.zh: 我知道迪卡普尔是谁

translation.en: Well, he don't do nudes, so I never heard of him.
translation.zh: 他不画裸体人像 所以我没听说过他

translation.en: Get to it, Rotty.
translation.zh: 说重点 若提

translation.en: Worth something like 10,000 kruge.
translation.zh: 那幅画价值一万克鲁格

translation.en: The thief had to get past four roving guards,
translation.zh: 小偷居然通过了四名巡逻警卫的看守

translation.en: high fences, padlocked doors,
translation.zh: 加高围栏、上锁的门

translation.en: and a security system designed by one of them Grisha witches.
translation.zh: 还有某个格里莎女巫设计的安保系统

translation.en: -Fabrikator. -Whatever.
translation.zh: 是格里莎造物师 随便吧 重点是 这不是团伙作案就是鬼魂作祟

translation.en: The point is, either it was a group effort or a ghost.
translation.zh: 随便吧 重点是 这不是团伙作案就是鬼魂作祟

translation.en: Why does this concern me?
translation.zh: 这关我什么事？

translation.en: I've got a buyer lined up. Legit money.
translation.zh: 我这儿有个买家想入手 钱是合法的

translation.en: So, uh… if you hear a whisper… [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 所以…如果你听到什么风声…

translation.en: Who can hear a whisper here?
translation.zh: 这里听不到风声

translation.en: Hello, Inej.
translation.zh: 你好啊 伊奈什

translation.en: What information do you have for me tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚要给我什么情报？

translation.en: A lead on a job. A big one. Enough money to change lives.
translation.zh: 有一份活计 能赚大钱 足够让生活天翻地覆

translation.en: It doesn't take much to change someone's life in the Barrel.
translation.zh: 在巴罗改变一个人的生活 可要不了多少钱

translation.en: A million kruge?
translation.zh: 一百万克鲁格？

translation.en: What's the name?
translation.zh: 雇主是谁？

translation.en: Dreesen. A wealthy merchant.
translation.zh: 德里森 一个富商

translation.en: Dreesen.
translation.zh: 德里森

translation.en: I've heard of him.
translation.zh: 我听说过他

translation.en: He could afford it.
translation.zh: 他出得起这个价钱

translation.en: The question is, what's worth a million kruge to him?
translation.zh: 问题是对他来说 什么东西值一百万克鲁格？

translation.en: He's looking for a crew willing to cross the Fold into East Ravka
translation.zh: 他想找一队人穿过黑幕 进入东拉夫卡

translation.en: and bring back something.
translation.zh: 带一样东西回来

translation.en: The Fold?
translation.zh: 黑幕？

translation.en: Well, of course, certain death pays a million.
translation.zh: 当然了 找人送死确实得花一百万

translation.en: He didn't say what he wants nicked?
translation.zh: 他没说清楚想要什么东西？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: But he's taking meetings tonight, starting at midnight.
translation.zh: 但他要在今晚面试人选 从午夜开始

translation.en: Tell me you followed him.
translation.zh: 你应该跟踪过他吧？

translation.en: He brought someone in from a ship.
translation.zh: 他从船上带下来一个人

translation.en: Took a way back to his house in the Garden District to avoid attention.
translation.zh: 为了避人耳目 从花园区走回他家

translation.en: I would have followed him inside, but Dreesen's hired some private security.
translation.zh: 我也想跟进去 但德里森雇了些私人保安

translation.en: I would have had to use my knives to get closer.
translation.zh: 要想靠近 就得动兵刃

translation.en: -[thunder rumbling] -Private security.
translation.zh: 私人保安

translation.en: Anyone we know?
translation.zh: 我们认识吗？

translation.en: A Zemeni man. I think his name is Tendo. You know him?
translation.zh: 一个赞姆尼人 好像名叫谭多 你认识吗？

translation.en: Yeah. He gambles at one of Pekka's clubs.
translation.zh: 嗯 他常在佩卡的一家俱乐部赌博

translation.en: So I won't have leverage on him.
translation.zh: 我指使不动他

translation.en: But Pekka will.
translation.zh: 但佩卡可以

translation.en: Kaz, I got this lead from one of the girls at the Menagerie.
translation.zh: 卡兹 我是从兽园的一个女孩那里 打探到的情报

translation.en: They tell me things in case you'd buy them out, like you did with me.
translation.zh: 只要付钱 他们就给消息 就像你付钱给我一样

translation.en: I didn't, I'm paying off your indenture.
translation.zh: 我没付你钱 只是替你赎身

translation.en: You know what I mean.
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思

translation.en: This one girl, Kesh, she has skill. She's like me.
translation.zh: 有个叫凯什的女孩 她跟我一样有异能

translation.en: I only invest in the one of a kind.
translation.zh: 我只在独一无二的人身上投资

translation.en: She isn't like you.
translation.zh: 她跟你不一样

translation.en: No one is.
translation.zh: 你是独一无二的

translation.en: So? What's our move now?
translation.zh: 那我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: You're the one of us who believes in a higher power.
translation.zh: 我们团队中只有你相信神的存在

translation.en: If we're going to survive a round trip through the Fold,
translation.zh: 若我们想穿越黑幕活着回来

translation.en: we'll need a miracle or two.
translation.zh: 只能期盼奇迹出现

translation.en: What's a Shu girl doing here?
translation.zh: 书翰人在这里做什么？

translation.en: I'm Ravkan. On the cartography team.
translation.zh: 我是拉夫卡人 是制图师队伍里的

translation.en: She's half Shu. An orphan.
translation.zh: 她是孤儿 有一半的书翰血统

translation.en: [line cook] Is that an answer?
translation.zh: 那算回答吗？

translation.en: Back of the line. Your friends, too.
translation.zh: 到队尾去 你的朋友也是

translation.en: I don't know them.
translation.zh: 我不认识他们

translation.en: Then you go. Come on!
translation.zh: 那就你自己去 快！

translation.en: [woman] You can get arrested for that.
translation.zh: 你不怕被捕吗？

translation.en: Stealing from Second Army will get you thrown in a hole.
translation.zh: 从第二军团偷东西可是要进监狱的

translation.en: Maybe you should arrest me.
translation.zh: 也许你应该逮捕我

translation.en: Hang on.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Aren't you one of our escorts for the crossing?
translation.zh: 你是要护送我们 穿越黑幕的人之一吧？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: I don't mind sharing.
translation.zh: 我不介意跟你分享

translation.en: Well, it's not for me. It's for a friend.
translation.zh: 不是我要吃 是给一个朋友的

translation.en: Some of it's for me.
translation.zh: 我也会吃点儿

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: I'm Mal. I'm a tracker.
translation.zh: 我叫玛尔 是个追踪手

translation.en: Zoya. I'm a Squaller.
translation.zh: 我叫佐娅 是御风师

translation.en: When I get nerves the night before,
translation.zh: 黑幕之行的前夜 难免会有些害怕

translation.en: I like to have a good tumble with a stranger.
translation.zh: 我喜欢跟陌生人云雨一番

translation.en: Clears my head.
translation.zh: 清除杂念

translation.en: That's my remedy.
translation.zh: 这是我的排解方式

translation.en: I should go.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: You don't seem like the type who does what they should.
translation.zh: 你不像是那种循规蹈矩的人

translation.en: [sighs] I found you.
translation.zh: 找到你啦

translation.en: [Alina] You always do, somehow.
translation.zh: 你总能找到我 真奇怪

translation.en: Well, it's not hard, you always perch.
translation.zh: 找你又不是什么难事 你总爱待在高处

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm brooding.
translation.zh: 我在思考

translation.en: Well, I have something for you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我给你带了样东西

translation.en: Where did you get these?
translation.zh: 你从哪儿弄来的？

translation.en: -I stole them. -From a Grisha tent? [laughs]
translation.zh: -偷来的 -从格里莎的帐篷里？

translation.en: I thought it would get me an invitation to jail,
translation.zh: 我以为这会害我锒铛入狱

translation.en: but it just got me an invitation to tumble with a Grisha.
translation.zh: 可没想到 只收到一个格里莎的交欢邀请

translation.en: You tumbled a Grisha?
translation.zh: 你跟格里莎上床了？

translation.en: [chuckles] No. No, I just flirted with her.
translation.zh: 没有 就是调了一下情

translation.en: Maybe she flirted with me.
translation.zh: 或许该说是我被她调戏了

translation.en: -Look, Grisha women scare me. Okay? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 格里莎女人让我害怕 好吧？

translation.en: Did you see the lieutenant?
translation.zh: 你去见过中尉了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 见过了

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: turns out they do need me. So…
translation.zh: 原来他们确实需要我 所以…

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: I could shoot you in the foot.
translation.zh: 我可以开枪打伤你的脚

translation.en: -You're a terrible shot. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你准头太烂了

translation.en: Don't cross it.
translation.zh: 别去黑幕

translation.en: When I was young,
translation.zh: 小时候

translation.en: I had nightmares about it.
translation.zh: 我做过关于它的噩梦

translation.en: Going in.
translation.zh: 我走进黑幕

translation.en: Finding my parents…
translation.zh: 发现我的父母…

translation.en: still dead.
translation.zh: 还是死了

translation.en: Waiting for me.
translation.zh: 在那儿等着我

translation.en: -Well, orders are orders. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 总之 军令如山

translation.en: If it goes wrong, come back. You've lost enough to it already.
translation.zh: 一旦情况不妙 马上回来 黑幕已经害你失去够多的了

translation.en: I'll find my way back to you.
translation.zh: 我会回到你身边的

translation.en: Promise.
translation.zh: 我保证

translation.en: But first, I am going gambling in Ketterdam.
translation.zh: 但首先 我要去凯特丹赌一把喽

translation.en: [chuckling] Without me?
translation.zh: 撇下我？

translation.en: I'll write you a letter.
translation.zh: 我会给你写信的

translation.en: [Kaz] Tell us how to safely cross the Fold.
translation.zh: 告诉我们如何平安穿越黑幕

translation.en: The Fold?
translation.zh: 黑幕？

translation.en: If I knew safe passage through that,
translation.zh: 若我知道平安穿越黑幕的途径

translation.en: I'd be wealthier than the whole Merchant Council.
translation.zh: 我就比整个商会还富有了

translation.en: You told me you brought in girls from Os Alta. The other side.
translation.zh: 你跟我说过 你从黑幕那头的欧斯奥塔带来了女孩

translation.en: Yeah. The hard way. Lost a few to those damn volcra, too.
translation.zh: 对 付出了惨痛代价 还在涡克拉手上折损了人手

translation.en: Nah, there's no trick to it
translation.zh: 没什么诀窍

translation.en: except how it makes people disappear from time to time.
translation.zh: 就是知道它会时不时让人消失

translation.en: I heard you bragging of a way to make a path.
translation.zh: 我听过你炫耀 说你知道穿越黑幕的方法

translation.en: I was taking kruge from a tourist. A little lie.
translation.zh: 一个游客付给我克鲁格 我忽悠他的

translation.en: The Fold keeps those Ravkan bastards and their Grisha attack dogs in check.
translation.zh: 黑幕约束着那些拉夫卡混蛋 和他们的格里莎爪牙

translation.en: Can you imagine how dangerous it would be if it wasn't there?
translation.zh: 要是没有黑幕 你能想象形势有多危险吗？

translation.en: [man] Just go around.
translation.zh: 干脆绕道吧

translation.en: It stretches all the way north to the Fjerdan border.
translation.zh: 黑幕一直往北延伸到菲尔达边境

translation.en: Ja. So go to Fjerda. March through the permafrost.
translation.zh: 对 那就去菲尔达 穿越永冻冰原

translation.en: How long would that take?
translation.zh: 要多长时间？

translation.en: From here? Four months.
translation.zh: 从这里过去？四个月

translation.en: Maybe five.
translation.zh: 或许要五个月

translation.en: We don't have that kind of time.
translation.zh: 我们没那么多时间

translation.en: Either you take your time or you take your chances.
translation.zh: 要么绕远路 要么赌运气

translation.en: Here's what I don't get.
translation.zh: 有件事我不明白

translation.en: -We're going to be here all night. -Rude.
translation.zh: -我们要在这儿待一整晚呢 -没礼貌

translation.en: Why haven't they tried going under it? Just dig a tunnel.
translation.zh: 为什么没人试过从底下走？ 就挖个隧道

translation.en: Tried that. More than a century ago.
translation.zh: 试过了 一个多世纪前就有人试过

translation.en: Something… heard them digging.
translation.zh: 有东西…听到了他们的挖掘声

translation.en: It was made hundreds of years ago by that crazy Grisha…
translation.zh: 几百年前那个疯子格里莎 制造了黑幕…

translation.en: The Black Heretic.
translation.zh: 他叫黑色异端

translation.en: The one who controls shadow. They've got one in their army now.
translation.zh: 他能操控暗影 如今他们的军团里 也有一个人具备此异能

translation.en: General Kirigan?
translation.zh: 奇利甘将军？

translation.en: [Inej] Your point?
translation.zh: 你想说什么？

translation.en: [Jesper] If one of his kind made it, can't he unmake it?
translation.zh: 既然他的同类制造了黑幕 他就不能消除它吗？

translation.en: Have you ever put out fire by adding more fire?
translation.zh: 你试过用火来灭火吗？

translation.en: Then what's the opposite?
translation.zh: 那黑幕的克星是什么？

translation.en: -A Sun Summoner. -[Jesper] Right, then, one of those.
translation.zh: -太阳召唤者 -是哦 就是那个

translation.en: Doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 根本不存在

translation.en: Doesn't exist yet.
translation.zh: 只是目前还没出现

translation.en: Dreesen comes into town, doesn't waste a minute.
translation.zh: 德里森来到镇上 争分夺秒

translation.en: Sends out for a crew to steal something but doesn't specify what.
translation.zh: 派一队人去偷东西 但不说明目标是什么

translation.en: Is it heavy, large, worth more than a million on the black market?
translation.zh: 那玩意儿重吗？大不大？ 在黑市价值超过一百万吗？

translation.en: Maybe he doesn't know.
translation.zh: 或许他也不知道

translation.en: We can let this one go, Kaz.
translation.zh: 我们可以不接这单

translation.en: -Sounds like a trap, anyway. -[Kaz] A trap would sound easy.
translation.zh: -反正听着像个陷阱 -真要设陷阱 会编个简单的任务

translation.en: This is something else.
translation.zh: 这事有蹊跷

translation.en: [man] Boss, boss.
translation.zh: 老大

translation.en: We intercepted a note from Dreesen.
translation.zh: 我们从德里森那里截获了一张字条

translation.en: Did you, now?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: It's for the owner of the Orchid.
translation.zh: 是给幽兰院主人的

translation.en: Says they require the services of a Heartrender. Tonight.
translation.zh: 他们需要一名摄心者 就在今晚

translation.en: A Heartrender? Why?
translation.zh: 摄心者？为什么？

translation.en: Doesn't say. Just they need it before midnight.
translation.zh: 他们没说 只要求午夜之前找到人

translation.en: You don't bring in a Heartrender
translation.zh: 用到摄心者 只有一种可能

translation.en: unless you need an answer out of someone who isn't willing to talk.
translation.zh: 那就是他们想从某人嘴里撬出答案

translation.en: That's how we get this job before anyone else.
translation.zh: 给德里森带去一个摄心者

translation.en: Bring Dreesen a Heartrender.
translation.zh: 我们就能夺得这份差事

translation.en: [man] Boss, just one problem.
translation.zh: 老大 只有一个问题

translation.en: Pekka Rollins knows.
translation.zh: 佩卡罗林斯也知道这件事

translation.en: Pekka Rollins.
translation.zh: 佩卡罗林斯

translation.en: [chuckles] Pekka Rollins.
translation.zh: 佩卡罗林斯

translation.en: So, you know who I am. That makes things easier.
translation.zh: 既然你知道我是谁 事情就好办了

translation.en: [man] You lead the Dime Lions.
translation.zh: 你是银狮帮的首领

translation.en: My men tell me that you run this club.
translation.zh: 我的人告诉我 你经营着这家俱乐部

translation.en: I do. [wheezing]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: And the brothel next door.
translation.zh: 还有隔壁的妓院

translation.en: -The Orchid. -That's right.
translation.zh: -“幽兰院” -没错

translation.en: Fine girls there. Boys, too. Whatever you like.
translation.zh: 那里有美女 还有帅小伙 随你挑

translation.en: Abram, get in here!
translation.zh: 艾布兰 进来！

translation.en: Hmm. Abram wouldn't let us talk, so we did the other thing.
translation.zh: 艾布兰不让我们开口 我们只好动手了

translation.en: I'll jump straight to it. I'm in a bit of a rush.
translation.zh: 我赶时间 就有话直说了

translation.en: I'm in need of a Heartrender tonight for a million-kruge job.
translation.zh: 我要接一单百万克鲁格的活儿 今晚需要一名摄心者

translation.en: And you got one. At the Orchid.
translation.zh: 你手上就有一个 在幽兰院

translation.en: [man] You want Milana, then.
translation.zh: 原来你想要米拉娜

translation.en: I can get you a good rate for her by the hour…
translation.zh: 我可以给你一个好价钱 按小时计费…

translation.en: No, no, I'm not renting her.
translation.zh: 不 我不是要招妓

translation.en: It's for a job.
translation.zh: 我是要带她去干活

translation.en: If I bring her back, she'll tell you about the job.
translation.zh: 若我能带着她回来 她会告诉你详情

translation.en: Next thing you know, everyone is talking about the job.
translation.zh: 而且很快 所有人都会谈论这件事

translation.en: [breathing heavily] My indentures are discreet.
translation.zh: 我的人个个都谨言慎行

translation.en: [Pekka] Hmm. Because they work for you, right?
translation.zh: 因为他们都效忠于你 对吧？

translation.en: So here's the deal.
translation.zh: 来做个交易吧

translation.en: Work for me,
translation.zh: 你替我做事

translation.en: give over this dump and the Orchid,
translation.zh: 把这破地方和幽兰院交给我

translation.en: then I'll give you 10% of whatever business comes in.
translation.zh: 我会分给你一成的收益

translation.en: [chuckling] That's a shit deal. I already get 100%.
translation.zh: 谁会做这种破交易 我明明可以坐收全部利润

translation.en: [Pekka] Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 是哦 好吧

translation.en: The other option is…
translation.zh: 你还有另一个选择…

translation.en: I'll carve you up
translation.zh: 我把你砍了

translation.en: and leave you in a barrel for the rats.
translation.zh: 扔进木桶里喂老鼠

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: how about ten?
translation.zh: 你觉得一成如何？

translation.en: Cheer up, Dubrov.
translation.zh: 打起精神来 杜布洛夫

translation.en: The Black General's here to save the day.
translation.zh: 我们有黑暗将军坐镇呢

translation.en: Oh, is he going to tear down the Fold?
translation.zh: 他会摧毁黑幕吗？

translation.en: No, I was being sarcastic.
translation.zh: 不是 你没听出我在嘲讽他吗？

translation.en: He's a Grisha, not a miracle-worker.
translation.zh: 他是格里莎 又不是奇迹缔造者

translation.en: Is it him?
translation.zh: 是他吗？

translation.en: General Kirigan.
translation.zh: 奇利甘将军

translation.en: The leader of the Second Army here to grace us with his presence?
translation.zh: 第二军团的首脑来亲临慰问我们？

translation.en: He must believe the new skiff will be a shining success.
translation.zh: 他大概坚信那艘新船能凯旋而归吧

translation.en: [man] Or a spectacular failure.
translation.zh: 或者一败涂地

translation.en: -Alexei. -[Alexei] What?
translation.zh: -阿莱克西 -怎么了？

translation.en: Sorry, Mal.
translation.zh: 对不起 玛尔

translation.en: Do you think he's coming with us?
translation.zh: 你觉得他会跟我们同行吗？

translation.en: If he does, then you know what he believes.
translation.zh: 若他决定同去 你就知道 他对此行到底有没有信心了

translation.en: Are we children, or are we soldiers?
translation.zh: 你们是军人还是三岁小孩？

translation.en: Get to your posts and pack your gear. Skiff launches in 20.
translation.zh: 回到自己的岗位 收拾好装备 20分钟后开船

translation.en: Sergeant, get your crew ready!
translation.zh: 中士 让你的队员准备好！

translation.en: Mal, you're with me, son. Chin up.
translation.zh: 玛尔 你跟我一起 小子 开心点

translation.en: I've crossed it three times without incident.
translation.zh: 我已经三次穿越黑幕了 无惊无险

translation.en: You'll get your first soon enough.
translation.zh: 很快你也将完成首次穿越

translation.en: I'll be back before you know it.
translation.zh: 我去去就回

translation.en: And I'll be here the whole time.
translation.zh: 我会一直留在这里

translation.en: Me and the cartographers, I mean.
translation.zh: 我是说 我和制图师们

translation.en: [young Alina] We can't hide forever.
translation.zh: 我们不能躲藏一辈子

translation.en: We can run. Together.
translation.zh: 我们可以逃跑 一起逃

translation.en: Petya, how did this happen?
translation.zh: 派特雅 怎么会这样？

translation.en: We don't know. We were extra careful to secure all the lanterns.
translation.zh: 不知道 我们已经格外提防油灯失火了

translation.en: -And what was damaged? -Nothing major.
translation.zh: -有哪些损坏？ -重要文件都没事

translation.en: Just some records of the western coast line,
translation.zh: 就是一些关于西海岸线

translation.en: Os Kervo and the river system that runs through it.
translation.zh: 欧斯科沃 及其河流系统的记录

translation.en: -It's really not… -Critical?
translation.zh: -其实不… -不严重？

translation.en: Geographical data of the territory on the other side of the damn Fold?
translation.zh: 你说的是 黑幕对面区域的地理数据吗？

translation.en: Those records?
translation.zh: 那些记录？

translation.en: Yes, but I'm sure that the First Army on the other side has an--
translation.zh: 是的 但我想 驻扎在那边的第一军团肯定有…

translation.en: You think I trust anyone else's intel?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会相信别人的情报吗？

translation.en: Now someone will have to cross the Fold, to redraw these maps.
translation.zh: 现在必须有人穿越黑幕 重新绘制这些地图

translation.en: I'll go. Put me on the skiff, I'll go.
translation.zh: 我去 让我上船 我会去的

translation.en: Yes. You will.
translation.zh: 对 你是要去

translation.en: Your whole unit will.
translation.zh: 你们一整队人都要去

translation.en: I don't understand. We were going south, now we're going west?
translation.zh: 我不明白 我们原本是要往南走的 现在却改成往西？

translation.en: -What did you do? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -你做了什么？ -什么也没做

translation.en: Leave her alone, Raisa. You want everything to be her fault.
translation.zh: 别烦她了 瑞莎 你什么都想怪在她头上

translation.en: I'm usually right.
translation.zh: 我通常都没错怪她

translation.en: -[Alina gasps] -What the hell are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: -We've been assigned with you. -No. Turn around right now.
translation.zh: -我们被指派给你的队伍 -不行 现在立刻回去

translation.en: Orders are orders.
translation.zh: 军令如山

translation.en: I could shoot you in the foot.
translation.zh: 我可以开枪打烂你的脚

translation.en: I like my feet, thank you.
translation.zh: 我对我的脚挺满意的 谢了

translation.en: -Tell them you're too sick to go. -I'm never that sick.
translation.zh: -跟他们说你病重去不了 -我从来没生过重病

translation.en: Lie if you have to.
translation.zh: 必要时撒个慌呗

translation.en: And what's your lie? I'm with you.
translation.zh: 你准备撒什么谎？你去哪我就去哪

translation.en: Get off this boat now, or I'll carry you off.
translation.zh: 立刻下船 否则我扛你下去

translation.en: [Sergeant Yure] Raise the gate!
translation.zh: 升起闸门！

translation.en: Ready to lock up.
translation.zh: 准备上锁

translation.en: I'll make it, promise.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的 我保证

translation.en: Sergeant! What now?
translation.zh: 中士！现在什么情况？

translation.en: The Grisha will tell us.
translation.zh: 格里莎会告诉我们

translation.en: Not her. The Inferni.
translation.zh: 不是说她 我是说那个御火师

translation.en: [claps hands] Here's how it goes. We go into the Fold,
translation.zh: 计划是这样的 我们进入黑幕

translation.en: it gets dark, but we like it dark.
translation.zh: 周围会变得一片漆黑 但这是好事

translation.en: That keeps us from drawing attention.
translation.zh: 里面的生物不易察觉我们

translation.en: That's how we travel.
translation.zh: 我们要在黑暗中潜行

translation.en: The only light we use is the blue one at the mast.
translation.zh: 到时我们只会使用桅杆上的蓝灯

translation.en: It's weak but safe.
translation.zh: 光线微弱 但不会害我们暴露

translation.en: [Raisa] But you're an Inferni, right?
translation.zh: 可你不是御火师吗？

translation.en: Why are you here if we're supposed to keep things dark?
translation.zh: 既然船上不准有光亮 还要你来做什么？

translation.en: For when the dark comes to keep you.
translation.zh: 在黑暗来吞噬你们之时出手相救

translation.en: Where's your general? Kirigan?
translation.zh: 你们的将军奇利甘呢？

translation.en: [sailor] Ready for launch!
translation.zh: 准备开船！

translation.en: That's our cue.
translation.zh: 该出发了

translation.en: Right, listen to me, cartographers.
translation.zh: 好了 听我说 制图师们

translation.en: Until we reach the western dry docks,
translation.zh: 在抵达西面的干船坞之前

translation.en: you are to remain at your station.
translation.zh: 你们必须乖乖待在各自的位置

translation.en: Do not, I repeat, do not leave the skiff during the crossing.
translation.zh: 绝不允许 我重复一遍 绝不允许在穿越黑幕期间离开飞船

translation.en: In we go.
translation.zh: 要进去了

translation.en: Marker one.
translation.zh: 到第一个标记点了

translation.en: How many more are there?
translation.zh: 还有多少个？

translation.en: Thirty-seven.
No.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: -Blow it out! What are you doing? -[creature growling]
translation.zh: 吹灭它！你在干什么？

translation.en: What do we--
translation.zh: 我们怎么…

translation.en: Come at me! Come at me, you coward!
translation.zh: 来啊！来抓我啊 胆小鬼！

translation.en: [Alina] Alexei, no!
translation.zh: 阿莱克西 不要！

translation.en: [mouthing] Mal!
translation.zh: 玛尔！

translation.en: Mal!
translation.zh: 玛尔！

translation.en: I'll meet you at the meadow.
translation.zh: 我们草原上见

translation.en: General Zlatan. Your orders?
translation.zh: 扎坦将军 请指示

translation.en: It's been too long.
translation.zh: 过去太久了

translation.en: They should have emerged two hours ago.
translation.zh: 他们两小时前就该出现了

translation.en: [soldier] Sir! Look!
translation.zh: 长官！你看！

translation.en: Where is the rest of your crew?
translation.zh: 你的其余队员呢？

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: new management, gents.
translation.zh: 管理者换人了 先生们

translation.en: Here's the deal.
translation.zh: 我来说明一下

translation.en: The Heartrender is gone, boss.
translation.zh: 摄心者不见了 老大

translation.en: Someone else got her.
translation.zh: 她被别人带走了

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: I really appreciate new business,
translation.zh: 我很重视新客户

translation.en: but you've only paid for an hour of my time,
translation.zh: 但你只买了我一个小时的时间

translation.en: and I have to be back at the Orchid.
translation.zh: 然后我就得回幽兰院去了

translation.en: [Kaz] The Orchid isn't safe tonight. Your life's in danger with this job.
translation.zh: 今晚幽兰院不安全 这份工作会给你带来生命危险

translation.en: Make yourself scarce for a few days afterwards.
translation.zh: 事成之后 你先离开幽兰院几天

translation.en: Mr. Brekker, are you threatening me? Really?
translation.zh: 布瑞克先生 你在威胁我吗？是吗？

translation.en: Even if I'm nice, my boss will call the stadwatch on you.
translation.zh: 就算我不跟你计较 我老板也会报警抓你

translation.en: It's not me you're in danger with. It's Pekka Rollins.
translation.zh: 威胁到你的不是我 是佩卡罗林斯

translation.en: My boss would call the stadwatch on him as well.
translation.zh: 我老板也会报警抓他

translation.en: Which is why your boss is already dead.
translation.zh: 所以你老板已经死了

translation.en: -[man] Who are you lot? -We're here to see Dreesen.
translation.zh: -你们是什么人？ -我们是来见德里森的

translation.en: [man] You're not with Pekka's crew.
translation.zh: 你不是佩卡的人

translation.en: And you're not in Pekka's pocket anymore if you don't owe him.
translation.zh: 你不欠佩卡的钱 就不必再受制于他了

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that coin?
translation.zh: 你从哪弄来的硬币？

translation.en: [man] Hey! One of these has a hole in it!
translation.zh: 嘿！有块硬币上有个洞！

translation.en: Saints.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Inside. Inside. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 进屋

translation.en: One look and I can tell. Criminals.
translation.zh: 我一眼就能看出来 你们是罪犯

translation.en: I'm not meeting anyone 'til midnight.
translation.zh: 午夜之前 我不见任何人

translation.en: We heard you needed a Heartrender.
translation.zh: 我们听说你需要一个摄心者

translation.en: All right, she stays, the rest of you, out.
translation.zh: 好吧 她留下 其他人出去

translation.en: She stays.
translation.zh: 她留下

translation.en: And we have an exclusive on this job.
translation.zh: 这项任务全权交给我们

translation.en: Mr. Brekker.
translation.zh: 布瑞克先生

translation.en: No businessman worth his salt hires his first applicant.
translation.zh: 精明的商人不会只见了第一个申请人 就决定雇佣他

translation.en: [Kaz] No. No, I understand.
translation.zh: 对 我理解

translation.en: Of course, I will have to report you to the guild
translation.zh: 当然 我也不得不向商会举报你

translation.en: for kidnapping and harboring a prisoner without chain of title.
translation.zh: 未经授权擅自绑架和窝藏囚犯

translation.en: You wouldn't.
translation.zh: 你不会这么做的

translation.en: No businessman worth his salt
translation.zh: 精明的商人

translation.en: bargains for what he can take.
translation.zh: 不会为唾手可得的东西讨价还价

translation.en: I have to be back in an hour.
translation.zh: 我只能待一个小时

translation.en: All right, come on.
translation.zh: 好吧 过来

translation.en: Who's this?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: So you don't know everything after all.
translation.zh: 看来你也不是无所不知啊

translation.en: This…
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: is Alexei Stepanov.
translation.zh: 阿莱克西斯代帕诺夫

translation.en: Two weeks ago, young Alexei here
translation.zh: 两周前 这位年轻人

translation.en: crossed through the Fold on foot.
translation.zh: 徒步穿越了黑幕

translation.en: Alone.
translation.zh: 而且是独自一人

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么可能？

translation.en: They're keeping it quiet,
translation.zh: 相关人员都闭口不谈

translation.en: but allegedly -he was one of a few witnesses to… -[water pouring]
translation.zh: 但据说当时发生了一件事 而他是为数不多的…

translation.en: …an event.
translation.zh: 目击者之一

translation.en: [Alexei] Water.
translation.zh: 水

translation.en: What kind of event?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: [Dreesen] I know an expedition was swarmed by volcra.
translation.zh: 我知道有支探险队遭遇涡克拉围攻

translation.en: Should've been a total loss,
translation.zh: 按道理 本该全军覆没的

translation.en: but something happened.
translation.zh: 但发生了某件事

translation.en: Some device detonated.
translation.zh: 某件装置爆炸了

translation.en: Obliterated the volcra,
translation.zh: 它消灭了涡克拉

translation.en: lit up the dark like a forest fire.
translation.zh: 如同森林大火 点亮了黑暗

translation.en: I know it wasn't a fire or else no one would have survived.
translation.zh: （东拉夫卡 克里比斯克） 但我知道那不是火 否则不可能有人幸存下来

translation.en: [Dreesen] This was some invention no one had seen before.
translation.zh: 一定是某种不为人知的新发明

translation.en: [Zoya] Healer!
translation.zh: 治疗师！

translation.en: He knows.
translation.zh: 他知道是怎么回事

translation.en: But he doesn't seem to be able to articulate his account of events.
translation.zh: 但他似乎无法组织语言 描述当时的情况

translation.en: Some form of traumatic lapse.
translation.zh: 大概是创伤后遗症吧

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: [Milana] You're safe now.
translation.zh: 你现在安全了

translation.en: Now you can just speak
translation.zh: 放心大胆地说吧

translation.en: and I will just listen.
translation.zh: 我会静静地听

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Tell me what happened in the Fold.
translation.zh: 告诉我在黑幕里发生的事

translation.en: What saved you?
translation.zh: 你是怎么得救的？

translation.en: [Alexei] You won't believe me, but…
translation.zh: 说出来你恐怕不信…

translation.en: it was a Sun Summoner.
translation.zh: 是一位太阳召唤者

translation.en: Who was it?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: If I tell you, you'll set me free?
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你 你会放了我吗？

translation.en: You have my word. I'll set you free.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 一定还你自由

translation.en: You're in Ketterdam now, Alexei.
translation.zh: 你现在在凯特丹了 阿莱克西

translation.en: You can go anywhere in the world from here.
translation.zh: 从这里 你可以去往世界任何地方

translation.en: Just imagine.
translation.zh: 想想看

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: Her name is…
translation.zh: 她叫…

translation.en: Alina Starkov.
translation.zh: 阿丽娜斯达科夫

translation.en: [Dreesen] Alina Starkov?
translation.zh: 阿丽娜斯达科夫？

translation.en: Good boy.
translation.zh: 好孩子

translation.en: Show me the manifest.
translation.zh: 给我看看乘客名单

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: You'll set me free now?
translation.zh: 可以放我走了吗？

translation.en: Thank you. Of course.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 当然

translation.en: We are now the only people west of the Fold with this information.
translation.zh: 如今在黑幕以西 只有我们知道这一情报

translation.en: My ship sails for West Ravka at dawn.
translation.zh: 我的船清晨出发航向西拉夫卡

translation.en: If you can prove that you have a way through the Fold and back,
translation.zh: 若你们能证明 你们有办法从黑幕往返

translation.en: I'll put you on that ship with an advance.
translation.zh: 我就提前雇你们上船

translation.en: If you don't, I'm giving this job to Pekka Rollins.
translation.zh: 否则我就把这份差事交给佩卡罗林斯

translation.en: Give me a day. I'll have a plan.
translation.zh: 给我一天时间 我会制定好计划

translation.en: You have until sunrise,
translation.zh: 日出之前给我答复

translation.en: then your ship will have sailed, Mr. Brekker.
translation.zh: 过期不候 布瑞克先生

translation.en: The prize is one million kruge.
translation.zh: 奖金是一百万克鲁格

translation.en: Now bring me Alina Starkov.
translation.zh: 把阿丽娜斯达科夫给我带过来
